entries.journal_entry_description: You found a piece of an old starmap. Nym seems to be interested in getting the completed map.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You've found a piece of a starmap and some other documents in a box at a fresh crash site. The documents detail that the owner of the box was to meet the pirate Nym in the Narmle hotel. Maybe you should go talk to him.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: You decided not to work for Nym and was happy with the credits he gave you for bringing him the documents.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Your only clue to where the second star map piece can be found was left by the treasure hunter on this job before you. '...apparently a child was taken captive by the natives on the planet of Tatooine. After his rescue, he recalled spotting one of the strangely ornated boxes near a pool in the cave that was his prison'.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: You've found the first map piece. Return to Nym and see what he's got to say.
